name: Shrimp Burgers
author: Ellen Jane Burdin Donahue
summary: Shrimp burgers with lemon and butter. Great for a summer lunch.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®)
2 tablespoons frozen butter cut in small pieces
2 tablespoons canola oil, or as needed
directions: Roughly chop 3 or 4 shrimp and place in a bowl
Pulse remaining shrimp in a food processor and transfer to the bowl with the chopped shrimp
Combine egg, bread crumbs, lemon juice, lemon zest, seafood seasoning, and black pepper in a bowl
Form mixture into 3 patties and refrigerate at least 30 minutes
Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat
Cook patties until browned, 4 to 5 minutes
Flip and cook until second side is browned, 4 to 5 minutes more
